programme.desc: Filem yang mengisahkan Iskandar Muhammad (Sabree Fadzil) yang merupakan anak seorang pesawah bercita-cita tinggi untuk menjadi seorang juruterbang selepas tamat pengajian dan telah menyertai Tentera Udara Di Raja Malaysia (TUDM) sehingga menjadi salah seorang pegawai.

programme.title: Bravo 5
programme.desc: Filem yang berlatarbelakang tahun 1989 ini mengisahkan mengenai lima anggota Komando Tentera Darat yang menjalankan operasi di sebuah hutan bagi mengekang kebangkitan pengganas komunis sehingga ada di antara mereka yang terkorban nyawa dalam menjalankan misi mereka.

programme.title: Prebet Lapok
programme.desc: Kisah Badul Lapok , seorang pemuda kampung nakal yang menganggur namun berubah setelah menjadi seorang anggota tentera dan menjadi wira dalam mempertahankan kedaulatan negara.

programme.title: Darah Satria
programme.desc: Filem yang menceritakan tentang tugas anggota angkatan tentera dan pengorbanan yang mereka lakukan demi negara yang tercinta, lakonan Aman Shah sebagai Leftenan Muda Rejimen Askar Melayu Di Raja.

programme.title: 1957 : Hati Malaya
programme.desc: Kisah Tunku Abdul Rahman, Perdana Menteri pertama Malaya pada tahun 1957, dalam usaha mendapatkan kemerdekaan dan Datuk Onn Ja’afar, pengasas Pertubuhan Kebangsaan Melayu Bersatu (UMNO) membangkitkan semangat nasionalisme orang Melayu menentang penubuhan Malayan Union yang dicadangkan oleh British pada tahun 1946.

programme.title: Aku Yang Berhormat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan bagaimana Hamid dan Jaafar, berusaha mendapatkan sokongan orang-orang kampung untuk menjatuhkan Jamali, wakil rakyat yang kejam dan tidak mengamalkan sikap 'Bersih, Cekap dan Amanah

programme.title: Embun
programme.desc: Berlatarkan zaman penjajahan Jepun di Tanah Melayu, filem ini mengisahkan Embun, seorang wanita yang sentiasa bersemangat dan cekal dalam perjuangan menentang pencerobohan Jepun walaupun menempuh pelbagai dugaan dan cabaran.

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Bini Gua Solehah
programme.desc: mengisahkan tentang pertembungan dua identiti yang berbeza apabila Andy Si Mat Rock dijodohkan dengan gadis persis ustazah iaitu Solehah. Konflik rumahtangga mereka semakin runcing apabila Solehah tidak lagi melayan ego Andy.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Telemovie Playboy kantoi

programme.title: Balaban Hidup : Infeksi Zombie
programme.desc: sekumpulan pengkaji asing melakukan eksperimen terhadap orang asli dan anak yatim untuk kepentingan diri. Kesan suntikan tersebut menyebabkan mangsa mati dan bertukar menjadi Zombi. Keadaan menjadi epidemik selepas wabak ini merebak dengan pantas dan sukar dikawal.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pendekar
programme.desc: Perebutan kuasa dan harta antara dua lelaki. Seorang daripadanya adalah waris yang berhak, manakala seorang lagi adalah pengkhianat yang berniat jahat. Perebutan ini menyaksikan keadaan huru hara terjadi disebuah kampung.

programme.title: Cendera Kasih
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Telemovie plsboy kantoi

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Klu
programme.desc: Pelajar perempuan yang menuntut di universiti telah jatuh cinta dengan pelajar lelaki dari universiti yang sama . sementara itu seorang pelajar lain meminati pelajar perempuan tersebut . berlaku salah faham antara pasangan tersebut . Namun setelah mendapat maklumat yang betul, pasangan masing-masing telah berbaik semula

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Seorang artis lelaki yang menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan seorang gadis sejak mereka di bangku sekolah lagi, namun cinta mereka telah dihalang oleh abang kepada gadis tersebut, yang beranggapan bahawa hidup seorang artis ini penuh dengan dunia glamor mereka sahaja, curang dan tiada masa hadapan.

programme.title: Lara Jonggrang
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda yang perkasa telah dilantik bagi mengambil dan membawa balik permaisuri kerajaan tersebut.Setelah berjaya dia mengetahui bahawa dia sebenarnya adalah anak kepada permaisuri dan raja negara berkenaan yang telah hilang diculik semasa masih kecil.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep4
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Juvana
programme.desc: Daim iaitu bekas tahanan juvana Wira Bakti yang meneruskan persekolahannya di sebuah sekolah telah dibuli dan dimalukan oleh sekumpulan pelajar yang diketuai oleh Adam.Setelah Sekolah Wira Bakti diarahkan penutupannya 6 orang rakan-rakan Daim telah dipindahkan ke Sekolah Indera Sakti..

programme.title: Debu-Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Pendekar
programme.desc: Perebutan kuasa dan harta antara dua lelaki. Seorang daripadanya adalah waris yang berhak, manakala seorang lagi adalah pengkhianat yang berniat jahat. Perebutan ini menyaksikan keadaan huru hara terjadi disebuah kampung.

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Telemovie plsboy kantoi

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri bernazar di sebuah makam “keramat” dan akhirnya mendapat seorang anak perempuan. Setelah dewasa anak perempuan mereka menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan seorang jejaka dan mereka bercadang untuk berkahwin. Hasrat mereka terhalang apabila satu rahsia sejarah latarbelakang keluarga mereka terbongkar oleh si ayah jejaka berkenaan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Aku Yang Berhormat
programme.desc: dua sahabat sebagai petani menanam kopi tinggal dikampung yang sama. Mereka bersikap “Bersih, Cekap dan Amanah” telah dipilih menjadi seorang wakil rakyat yang berjaya.

programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: Seorang penyayang haiwan lelaki telah ditawarkan kerja sebagai seorang pengawal keselamatan di sebuah zoo . dia berasa terperanjat dan terkejut apabila mengetahui bahawa semua haiwan di zoo tersebut boleh bertutur dalam bahasa manusia tetapi tiada orang mempercayainya

programme.title: Gila-Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya. Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya. Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap. Malah, dia memaki hamun orang gajinya. Setelah terlibat di dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya, perempuan itu mulai insaf dengan perbuatannya.

programme.title: Bini Gua Solehah
programme.desc: mengisahkan tentang pertembungan dua identiti yang berbeza apabila Andy Si Mat Rock dijodohkan dengan gadis persis ustazah iaitu Solehah. Konflik rumahtangga mereka semakin runcing apabila Solehah tidak lagi melayan ego Andy.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Mahmud, seorang taikun yang berkahwin dengan seorang janda yang mempunyai seorang anak lelaki, Zubaidah adalah pengusaha restoran. Baharum, anak kepada zubaidah berkawan dengan Mahmud anak angkat Mira sejak kecil. Apabila dewasa, hubungan mereka semakin kuat dan mereka saling menyayangi. Maher, bimbang harta peninggalan bapanya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Aku Yang Berhormat
programme.desc: dua sahabat sebagai petani menanam kopi tinggal dikampung yang sama. Mereka bersikap “Bersih, Cekap dan Amanah” telah dipilih menjadi seorang wakil rakyat yang berjaya.

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: Love Summer
programme.desc: Sekumpulan remaja berazam untuk memenuhi erti kehidupan mereka. Mereka bertemu secara kebetulan, menjadi kawan, dan jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: 2022 Tsunami
programme.desc: Pada 2022, Perdana Menteri Tribhop dan Dr. Siam menubuhkan pusat penggera bencana negara untuk mencegah bencana tsunami. Tetapi usaha mereka terbukti sia-sia apabila tragedi menimpa lagi.

programme.title: Klu
programme.desc: Pelajar perempuan yang menuntut di universiti telah jatuh cinta dengan pelajar lelaki dari universiti yang sama . sementara itu seorang pelajar lain meminati pelajar perempuan tersebut . berlaku salah faham antara pasangan tersebut . Namun setelah mendapat maklumat yang betul, pasangan masing-masing telah berbaik semula

programme.title: Apa Aku Bisa Bahagia Diatas Air Mata Wanita Lain
programme.desc: Inez adalah seorang isteri yang suka bersenang-senang. Suaminya Sandi, selalu menuruti kehendak isterinya. Ella merupakan pekerja di pejabat Sandi, mulai terpesona.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep377
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep18
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep293
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep9
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Tak Ada Gebetan Mantanpun Jadi
programme.desc: Sonia sangat marah kerana ketika dia menjalin hubungan dengan orang yang diminatinya, tiba-tiba Rizk, bekas kekasihnya, menganiaya Sonia. Sudah tentu Sonia hanya mengesyaki bahawa Rizki cemburu padanya. Adakah Rizki hanya cemburu atau adakah dia benar-benar mahu menyedarkan Sonia?

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep378
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep34
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Jleb Ep7
programme.desc: Jleb! (Jebakan Seleb) adalah rancangan realiti yang berkonsepkan 'prank', dimana artis itu membuat 'prank' kepada artis lain. Jangan lepaskan keseronokan menyaksikan reaksi artis yang tiada kesudahan ketika mereka saling 'prank' sesama sendiri oleh Joe Richard dan pasukan Jleb.

programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep294
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: Wah Gak Nyangka Bakal Serame Ini
programme.desc: Terkenal sombong dan terlalu selektif dalam memilih teman lelaki, Belle menjadi bahan ejekan di majlis perkahwinan rakannya sehingga dia berang lalu diusir. Kerana kejadian itu agak menggemparkan, dia terpaksa menuruti bapanya untuk melarikan diri ke kampung halamannya. Setibanya di destinasi, Belle sudah pun terlibat dengan masalah baru yang memaksa dia berpura-pura menjadi tunangan Arya.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep379
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep10
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep35
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Wah Gak Nyangka Bakal Serame Ini
programme.desc: Terkenal sombong dan terlalu selektif dalam memilih teman lelaki, Belle menjadi bahan ejekan di majlis perkahwinan rakannya sehingga dia berang lalu diusir. Kerana kejadian itu agak menggemparkan, dia terpaksa menuruti bapanya untuk melarikan diri ke kampung halamannya. Setibanya di destinasi, Belle sudah pun terlibat dengan masalah baru yang memaksa dia berpura-pura menjadi tunangan Arya.

programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep20
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Cinta Suci Ep295
programme.desc: Suci yang terjerat dalam masalah harus bernikah dengan Marcel kerana dia sangat memerlukan wang untuk menguruskan suami dan anaknya, iaitu Aditya dan Ronny agar mereka berdua dapat meneruskan hidup. Manakala, Monica membenci Suci kerana dia menganggap bahawa Suci telah memaksa Marcel mengahwininya.

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep11
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Gadis Penjual Takjil Yang Sukses Karena Ikhlas Merawat Nenek Tirinya
programme.desc: Setiap bulan Ramadan, Kemala sentiasa datang membantu nenek tirinya menjual takjil. Nenek selalu memberi upah kepada Kemala selepas habis berniaga. Tetapi upah yang diterimanya pasti diminta oleh ibu tirinya.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep380
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep19
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jleb Ep9
programme.desc: Jleb! (Jebakan Seleb) adalah rancangan realiti yang berkonsepkan 'prank', dimana artis itu membuat 'prank' kepada artis lain. Jangan lepaskan keseronokan menyaksikan reaksi artis yang tiada kesudahan ketika mereka saling 'prank' sesama sendiri oleh Joe Richard dan pasukan Jleb.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: A Violent Prosecutor
programme.desc: After a prosecution lawyer is framed and convicted for murder, he tries to catch the real murderer from jail with the help of a con artist.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Inside Men
programme.desc: A former political henchman seeks revenge for being dropped by a ruthless politician while a determined investigator tries to find proof of a connection between the two of them.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Destiny
programme.desc: Ji-woo is still hung up on a man she fell in love in her early twenties. Her worried father has no choice but to drag her to Gi-joon, who helps people to locate their long-lost first loves.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class…

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. The two start to discover a different side to each other as they roam around in Seoul.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Mr. Housewife
programme.desc: A dad enjoys his daily chores and taking care of his daughter at home. But when he faces financial trouble, he joins a TV game show to win the jackpot while pretending to be a housewife.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Inside Men
programme.desc: A former political henchman seeks revenge for being dropped by a ruthless politician while a determined investigator tries to find proof of a connection between the two of them.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: Dong Feng Po Ep2

programme.title: Dong Feng Po Ep3
programme.desc: The story of Yu Dongfeng enlisting in the army to earn a betrothal gift. After a series of baptisms of war, he gradually matured and grew into a tough guy.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep745746
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44644465
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3474
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44664467
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1937
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3476
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2470
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3476
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44674468
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep751752
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1938
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep358
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men deem themselves as heroes who can save the earth. While they feel frustrated in real life, a zombie from their favourite animation suddenly appears in Hong Kong, turning people into zombies and causing widespread chaos, the young men decide to take on the responsibility and fight the battle against the zombies!

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: n aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li’s daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: “In the Mood for Love” is Wong Kar-Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses are having an affair. Tony Leung won Best Actor at the 53rd Cannes Film Festival for his leading role and was the first Hong Kong artiste to receive this honour.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: Miracles of The Namiya General Store, The
programme.desc: From Japan's best-selling author, Keigo Higashino, comes a heartwarming fantasy of an everyday general store that becomes a portal through time. When three delinquents accidentally enter the premise, they trigger a series of events that allow a letter from the past, seeking advice, to mysteriously slips through the mail slot.

programme.title: Chasing The Dragon
programme.desc: The epic story behind the founding of the People’s Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic, featuring a star-studded cast of Chinese actors including Liu Ye, Zhu Yawen, and more!

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: Famed doctor Mo Tian Shi (Richard Ng) concocts an immortality medicine to save his terminally ill daughter Xiao Xin, but the cost for immortality is that she must drink human blood. Twenty years later, Mo's apprentice Li Yao Shi (Chin Siu Ho) returns to town and notices something is amiss, only to realise the horror is just about to begin…

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene!

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No
programme.desc: "The Scripture With No Words" had been lost for a long time. Everybody was eager to find it, even the ambitious Japanese. Dr. Wai, a former antiquarian, went to Shanghai trying to locate "The Scripture With No Words" and he discovered that it was in the possession of the leader of "Gang of Salt". And the game begin...

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: A House of Happiness
programme.desc: Uncle Shui suffers from Alzheimer's disease but still remembers his son and late wife. His caregiver Ha Gu leaves him as she cannot stand his bad temper. He then falls in love with a woman who looks like his late wife but has a hidden agenda. His neighbours try to seek help from Ha Gu and Shui’s son to make Shui see the truth about the newcomer.

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan (Chang Chan-peng) is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai (Alexander Fu Sheng). The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific (Nat Chen Pai-chiang). Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou (Wang Yu).

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: In Swift Sword, popular director Ho Meng-hua exposes a whole cast of established talent to create a searing martial arts extravaganza that reeks of steel-slashing bewitchment worthy of any swordplay epic.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries the young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha’s “The Book and the Sword”. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: The subtle repackage of the most filmed Ching Dynasty novel, The Dream Of The Red Chamber by renowned director Li Han-hsiang has earned public acclaim by attaining The Best Art Direction of The 15th Golden Horse Award, The Best Costume and The Best Art Direction Of The 24th Asian Film Festival. Brigitte Lin and Sylvia Chang play the adorable yet sorrowful couple Bao Yu and Dai Yu; playing their roles to the hilt in this gloomy love story of their uncontrollable destinies.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin find themselves and their martial arts schools pitted against another rival school and the expert they hire, Master Shan. This is a masterpiece of Director Liu Chia Liang and one of the top ten movies in 1981.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun…

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Blade, a henchman for a local gangster, Naaga, falls in love with Vidhya, the daughter of a factory owner. He has to choose between supporting her father and his boss, who are rivals.

programme.title: Mannar Vageyara
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Onaigal Jakkirathai
programme.desc: Four friends, who are unemployed, are in desperate need of money. When one of them, Azhagu, decides to kidnap his niece for ransom, they land in deep trouble.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Upon being released from prison, Sachi demands to lead a tranquil life with his family. However, fate has other plans for the ex-convict when he encounters a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Guna 369
programme.desc: The life of Guna, a happy-go-lucky man, turns upside down when he is falsely framed for a murder and imprisoned. After his release, he sets off to hunt the real culprits and expose their crimes.

programme.title: Salim
programme.desc: Salim, a doctor, runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon, his patience with the justice system snaps and he takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Greatfather
programme.desc: A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Idhu Kadhirvelan Kadhal
programme.desc: Kathir, who hates marriage, is in Coimbatore to resolve a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra but his heart is broken when he discovers that she is in love with someone else.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: A life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Danny
programme.desc: After the police inspector Kunthavai picks up a complex murder case for investigation, she takes the help of Danny, a smart police dog, to unearth a gang of dangerous criminals involved in serial killing.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Velaikkara Durai
programme.desc: Two friends, Pandi and Murugan, borrow money from Vatti Varadhan to invest in real estate business. However, their business plans collapse when the land broker cheats them by selling a burial ground.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Super Police
programme.desc: A cop wants to eradicate all the criminals and make the country a better place to live. Although he faces many obstacles in his path of righteousness, he does not give up.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant business. However, their plans get interrupted when he gets an order from a local gangster but falls for his girlfriend, Aishwarya.

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs
programme.desc: While in the pursuit of Raja, a ruthless don, the police accidentally kill Chandrababu, a medical student. Things take a turn when Chandrababu's spirit possesses Raja and turns him into a gentle soul.

programme.title: Kennedy Club
programme.desc: Savarimuthu, an ex-soldier, falls sick while training the women's kabaddi team of his village. Soon, a former student named Muruganandham is chosen to take his place.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Following an accident, a young man gets a major surgery performed on his face. However, when he realises that a lot of people are after his life, he decides to find out why.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Rajamahal
programme.desc: The spirits of two women seek revenge on the men who killed them.

programme.title: Mirch Masala
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.desc: Priya falls in love with Rahul, a womaniser, who jilts her after she gets pregnant. However, when she is ostracised by everyone, Ajay, her best friend, supports and helps her.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady Heron is a cultural blank slate when she first sets foot on the grounds of North Shore High School in a small town outside of Chicago, Illinois. After living in Africa, Cady has no idea how "wild" things can be in civilization until she crosses paths with one of the meanest species of all, the "Queen Bee," who at this school is the cool and calculating Regina George. But Cady doesn't just cross paths with this Queen Bee--she really stings her when she falls for Regina's ex-boyfriend Aaron Samuels. Now Regina is set to sting back by pretending to still like Aaron so he won't go out with Cady, all the while pretending to be her friend. With no choice but to use the same M.O. to stay in the game, the "Girl World" one-upmanship escalates until the entire school gets dragged into a first-class mean-fest.

programme.desc: Selfie 2.0 - The cyber team investigates the abductions of young women whose social network pages are being kept up to date. Rosanna Arquette guest stars.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: An ingenious & cynical international thief, who adopts the names of saints as his aliases, feels his professional shell cracking when he steals a secret formula for cold fusion from a beautiful scientist.

programme.title: Be Somebody
programme.desc: Eager to escape the burden of fame, Jordan Jaye abandons his tour bus and meets an independent, small town girl with big dreams.

programme.title: The Shipping News
programme.desc: An emotionally-beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Catch-22 (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Yossarian needlessly expends energy to avoid a feared mission; disaster catches up with him, when he least expects it.

programme.title: FBI (S2) Ep12

programme.title: CSI: Cyber (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Click Your Poison - Special Agent Avery Ryan and her team investigate when a man dies after taking medication he purchased from a hacked ad on a medical website.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

programme.desc: Hart vs. Mosley - Pumped by his 'knock-out' of Laila Ali during training for the charity fight, Kevin 'Fists of Funny' Hart and Sugar Shane Mosley square off at a raucous press conference before facing off in the ring.

programme.title: Key & Peele (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Puppy Dog Ice-T - Steve Jobs' hyper successor goes too far while Rihanna and Chris Brown decide to give their relationship another shot.

programme.title: Everybody's Fine
programme.desc: A widower realizes his only connection to his family was through his wife, and decides to visit and reunite with each of his grown children.

programme.title: The Presidio
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal and a San Francisco police inspector form an uneasy alliance during a joint military/police department investigation, and become embroiled in a web of passion, suspense and intrigue.

programme.desc: Emma vs Eddie and Alex - Dara Ó Briain schools our sixth former contestants Emma, Eddy, and Alex as they take on this iconic trivia-based quiz for the chance to win some epic prizes! No phones allowed.

programme.desc: Where's Poppa? - When Arthur gets to be too much to handle, Doug tries to pawn him off on his cousin.

programme.desc: Jo Koy's star continues to rise in his second feature-length, uncensored stand-up special, Lights Out.

programme.title: Maximum Ride

programme.title: Nick of Time
programme.desc: A young professional's six-year-old daughter is taken hostage by conspirators. They threaten to kill her unless he follows their instructions to kill the governor of California.

programme.title: The Day the Music Died: The Story of Don McLean's American Pie
programme.desc: Don McLean's iconic song "American Pie" is explored and examined through the lens of its 50 year legacy.

programme.title: Allied

programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Catch-22 (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: On a surreal trip, Yossarian begins to realize the magnitude and influence of Milo's business empire.

programme.title: FBI (S2) Ep13
programme.desc: Payback - When the son of a well-known retired FBI agent is taken in what appears to be a revenge kidnapping, the team must uncover if it's tied to the agent's past or trouble the son has gotten into on his own.

programme.title: CSI: Cyber (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Ghost In The Machine - The cyber team tracks a killer who hacks into a popular online game and tricks gamers into delivering illegal weapons.

programme.title: Color Of The Ocean
programme.desc: In this gripping refugee drama, the lives of Spanish cop José, German tourist Nathalie and Congolese refugee Zola become fatefully intertwined. As each person strives to survive and help others, they learn that to free someone, one has to free oneself first.

programme.title: Truth And Justice
programme.desc: Young Andres settles in a new farm. With rose-tinted lenses, he sets out to transform the farm into a prosperous paradise – all he needs is a healthy harvest, cooperative neighbours and a male heir. But, life turns out to be cruel and treacherous.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Mortal Club
programme.desc: In this black comedy, Inspector Coliandro discovers a series of gladiator-esque fights that involve fighters who are systematically drugged and manipulated. His sidekick for this case is Veena, a beautiful fighter who was herself once part of the system.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Special Match
programme.desc: In an attempt to help his good friend, Gamberini, with his gambling addiction, Inspector Coliandro infiltrates a clandestine gambling group. However, in doing so, he misses out on another of his case assignments and ends up endangering both their lives.

programme.title: Jeune Juliette
programme.desc: In this bubbly teenage drama, Juliette is a high school sophomore who has big dreams about friends, love and family. However, as each dream fails to materialise despite her best efforts, she learns to let go and find peace with who she really is

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Imperfect Age
programme.desc: Camilla and Sara are best friends who love ballet. Camilla comes from a working-class while Sara has a wealthy father. When Sara passes a critical ballet audition and Camilla doesn’t, jealousy emerges and triggers a vendetta with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Color Of The Ocean
programme.desc: In this gripping refugee drama, the lives of Spanish cop José, German tourist Nathalie and Congolese refugee Zola become fatefully intertwined. As each person strives to survive and help others, they learn that to free someone, one has to free oneself first.

programme.title: A Summer in South Tyrol
programme.desc: When Franziska Gasser travels back to South Tyrol following her father’s car accident, sparks fly between her and Marco Antonelli. However, the long-standing rivalry between the Germans and Italians threatens to put an abrupt end to the blooming romance.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Mortal Club
programme.desc: In this black comedy, Inspector Coliandro discovers a series of gladiator-esque fights that involve fighters who are systematically drugged and manipulated. His sidekick for this case is Veena, a beautiful fighter who was herself once part of the system.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Special Match
programme.desc: In an attempt to help his good friend, Gamberini, with his gambling addiction, Inspector Coliandro infiltrates a clandestine gambling group. However, in doing so, he misses out on another of his case assignments and ends up endangering both their lives.

programme.title: Un Amore Cosi Grande
programme.desc: In Verona, Vladimir is in search of his father who abandoned him years ago. However, he winds up falling for the wealthy Veronica. Through their turbulent relationship and a chance meeting with Il Volo, he discovers his one true gift - his voice.

programme.title: Jeune Juliette
programme.desc: In this bubbly teenage drama, Juliette is a high school sophomore who has big dreams about friends, love and family. However, as each dream fails to materialise despite her best efforts, she learns to let go and find peace with who she really is

programme.title: Fiore
programme.desc: Daphne, a delinquent teen, is in juvenile prison when she meets Josh, a fellow inmate. Against a rule that prohibits male-female interaction, Daphne and Josh cultivate a budding romance and navigate the vicissitudes of prison life.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: The Team
programme.desc: When Coliandro is invited to join the “Team”, an elite group of super officers, he readily agrees. However, he soon finds himself sucked into a ruthless system that eerily resembles that of the White Uno Gang, one of Italy’s most infamous criminal group.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Run, Coliandro, Run
programme.desc: Coliandro responds to the mysterious phone call of a sensual female voice that tells him that there is a bomb ready to explode if he - and only he - will not run to defuse it. But the bomb ready to explode is not the only one.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: A Story Nobody Cares About
programme.desc: When asked about a missing man, a man reveals that he saw him a while ago and remembers a story he wrote. The man retells the story about a boy who nobody cared about, who came from a country nobody cared about, who became someone people cared about.

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford
programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Run, Coliandro, Run
programme.desc: Coliandro responds to the mysterious phone call of a sensual female voice that tells him that there is a bomb ready to explode if he - and only he - will not run to defuse it. But the bomb ready to explode is not the only one.

programme.title: Strike
programme.desc: In this fictionalised biopic, Agnieszka is an aging, single mother working on the shipyards. When she is fired on unjust grounds, she fights back at the system and her actions soon inspire the first non-communist trade union revolt in Eastern Europe.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: When We Leave
programme.desc: German-born Umay flees a toxic marriage in Istanbul and takes her young son with her to Berlin. There, her conservative family rejects her return and she escapes again to protect her son. This is Umay’s journey of self-determination against all odds.

programme.title: A Story Nobody Cares About
programme.desc: When asked about a missing man, a man reveals that he saw him a while ago and remembers a story he wrote. The man retells the story about a boy who nobody cared about, who came from a country nobody cared about, who became someone people cared about.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Smartphone
programme.desc: Coliandro is contacted by a desperate girl whose boyfriend has disappeared after he stole a phone which contained confidential footage of Russian criminals. Coliandro actively takes up the case to prove his worth to the deputy prosecutor.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: The End Of The World
programme.desc: Coliandro attends an illegal motorcycle race and witnesses a fatal accident. Together with Buffarini, they save the rider responsible for the accident and find refuge. However, they soon end up on the run from the vengeful brother of the deceased rider.

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 04
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to mess with shoppers in an epic game of Hide-and-Sneak, the guys draw straws at a BBQ joint, and tonight's loser gets a bad case of stage fright while giving the performance of his life.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 05
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q hop behind the register at a burger joint and then head to a department store where they have only themselves to blame. And tonight's big loser gets into a rigged elevator only to find his own worst nightmare.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 8
programme.desc: Join the festivities with 20 of the most pinheaded partiers ever to make the scene. From wild bachelorettes to a drunk Santa and more than you ever wanted to know about butt chugging. With crazy commentary from Danny Bonaduce and our celebrity cast,plus hot comics like Billy Kimball and Brendon Walsh.
